label: Ramos-Tafur, Gabriel E.  2018. Alpheus luiszapatai, a new species of rare and colorful deep water alpheid shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from Arusí, Chocó Department, Pacific Coast of Colombia. Zootaxa 4403(3): 540–556.
